sentences.english: At the end of three years the Assyrians took it.
So he asked Jehoshaphat, 'Will you go with me to fight against Ramoth Gilead?'
sentences.chinese: 亚哈问约沙法说，你肯同我去攻取基列的拉末吗？

sentences.english: And the Chaldeans shall come again, and fight against this city, and take it, and burn it with fire.
sentences.chinese: 迦勒底人必再来攻打这城，并要攻取，用火焚烧。

sentences.english: Next Abimelech went to Thebez and besieged it and captured it.
sentences.chinese: 亚比米勒到提备斯，向提备斯安营，就攻取了那城。

sentences.english: And Solomon went to Hamath-zobah and took it.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门往哈马琐巴去，攻取了那地方。

sentences.english: In the fifth year of King Rehoboam, Shishak king of Egypt attacked Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 罗波安王第五年，埃及王示撒上来攻取耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Nevertheless David took the strong hold of Zion: the same is the city of David.
sentences.chinese: 然而大卫攻取锡安的保障，就是大卫的城。

sentences.english: Moreover, prolonging rice growth duration and developing large panicles improved annual grain yield of rice and wheat.
sentences.chinese: 延长水稻生育期和攻取大穗是稻麦周年高产的关键。

sentences.english: Solomon then went to Hamath Zobah and captured it.
sentences.chinese: 所罗门往哈马琐巴去，攻取了那地方。

sentences.english: Nevertheless, David captured the fortress of Zion, the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 然而大卫攻取锡安的保障，就是大卫的城。

sentences.english: ' Nevertheless, David captured the fortress of Zion, the City of David.
sentences.chinese: 然而大卫攻取锡安的保障，就是大卫的城。

sentences.english: And he took the fenced cities which pertained to Judah, and came to Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 他攻取了犹大的坚固城，就来到耶路撒冷。

sentences.english: Behold the mounts, they are come unto the city to take it;
sentences.chinese: 看哪，敌人已经来到，筑垒要攻取这城。

definition: to dispatch an army/to send troops
to seize control of (an enemy position)/(fig.) to take by storm/to gain (awards, control of a market etc)
to follow up a victory/to pursue retreating enemy
to guard/to hold a fortified position/entrenched
to retreat and defend/to withdraw and maintain one's guard
to go on a punitive expedition
